(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Advertorial) (NNP I))
    (VP (VBP have)
      (ADVP (RB always))
      (VP (VBD wondered)
        (SBAR
          (WHADVP (WRB how))
          (S
            (NP (NNP Bak) (NNP Kwa))
            (VP (VBZ is)
              (VP (VBN made)))))))
    (. .)))

    (ADVP (RB So))

            (NP (PRP me))

                  (NP
                    (NP (PRP$ their)

  (S
    (NP (DT This))
    (VP (VBZ ensures)
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (DT the) (NN meat))
          (VP

              (ADVP (RB still))
              (VBZ retains)
              (NP
                (NP (DT some))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (PRP$ its) (NN structure)))))
            (CC and)
            (VP (VBZ is)

                  (NP (PRP$ its) (NNS juiciness)))

                  (S
                    (VP (VBG preserving)
                      (NP
                        (NP (DT the) (NN fabric))
                        (PP (IN of)
